name: Dyle 2.0
description:
Dyle 2.0 is a sequel to the hard-as-nails platformer Dyle. 2.0 aims to be better than the original in every way it can be, while still retaining the same style as the first game.

In this game you will be traversing an ASCII world with an ASCII character. Seems like a lot of ASCII? That's because it is! Everything is ASCII!

There are only four levels currently, but more are to be added in the future, along with other features.

Dyle Discord: https://discord.gg/cSpAqns
